name: ​FeedElement​CapabilitiesInput

fields.name: associated​Actions
fields.description: Describes actions added to the feed element.

fields.name: bookmarks
fields.description: Describes bookmarks added to the feed element.

fields.name: canvas
fields.description: Describes a canvas app added to the feed element.

fields.name: content
fields.description: Describes content added to the feed element. Important This class isn’t available for feed posts in version 36.0 and later. In version 36.0 and later, use ConnectApi.​FilesCapabilityInput.

fields.name: extensions
fields.description: Describes the extensions associated with the feed element.

fields.name: feedEntityShare
fields.description: Describes the feed entity shared with the feed element.

fields.name: files
fields.description: Describes files attached to the feed element.

fields.name: link
fields.description: Describes a link added to the feed element.

fields.name: poll
fields.description: Describes a poll added to the feed element.

fields.name: questionAnd​Answers
fields.description: Describes a question and answer capability added to the feed element.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Describes the status of the feed element.

fields.name: topics
fields.description: Describes topics assigned to the feed element.

description: A container for all capabilities that can be included when creating a feed element.
